snippet: Called the "Cosmic Opera," the series will feature performances by actors in burlesque garb, a live string orchestra, opera singers, elaborate stage sets and a complex laser show.
abstract: Called the "Cosmic Opera," the series will feature performances by actors in burlesque garb, a live string orchestra, opera singers, elaborate stage sets and a complex laser show.

headline.main: Multimedia Dance Shows Coming to Hammerstein Ballroom
